effectiveness.name: Effectiveness
effectiveness.description: How effectively the action addresses the crisis and achieves the desired outcome

safety.name: Safety
safety.description: Safety of the action for both responders and affected population

speed.name: Speed of Implementation
speed.description: How quickly the action can be implemented and produce results

public_acceptance.name: Public Acceptance
public_acceptance.description: Likelihood of public cooperation and acceptance of the action

notes: These weights represent baseline values and may be adjusted based on specific crisis characteristics
Expert agents may have different weight preferences based on their domain expertise
The coordinator agent uses these as reference weights for consensus building
